ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] where is illusion: halfling?
ygData.msgSnippet: just erudin ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Talk to your friends online with Yahoo! Messenger. http://im.yahoo.com
ygData.messageBody:
just erudin

--- Mark Rafn <dagon@...> wrote:
> I can also now confirm that Illusion:Erudite has
> absolutely no effect
> except putting the spell icon in the corner. There
> really ought to be an
> "Illusion: Change Face" spell that would randomize
> the character graphic,
> (and an "Illusion: Leather/Chain/Plate" series that
> gave some AC and made
> it look like you were wearing armor). Ah, well.
>
> Next question: is Illusion: Halfling available
> anywhere outside of Erudin?
> I'm Currently based in Freeport (though camped in
> Highkeep after getting
> my pet), and would like to avoid the trip. I was
> hoping to find it in
> Neriak, but didn't see it.
> --
> Mark Rafn dagon@...
> <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
>
>
